name: Mushroom Quest (itch) (Kekzdozer, BirdboyGames)
description:
2D Singleplayer Action game with heavy RPG elements

We strongly recommend you to read through the "how to play" screens after launching.

The game currently does not support saving your progress.

Controls (Mouse & Keyboard):

  • Left Mouse Button - Sword Slash (3 part combo)
  • Right Mouse Button (hold) - Shielding (move mouse to change angle)
  • Q (hold) - Charge Headbutt, release to attack
  • E (hold) - Charge Bow Attack (move mouse to change angle), release to shoot

Recommended resolution: 1920 x 1080 (Full HD) or at least 16:9 aspect ratio

made by BirdBoyGames and Kekzdozer for the

Indie Game Making Contest 2018    

Music:

"Aces High", "Private Eye", "There It Is", "Presenterator" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
